name: HideshitYT
description:
This is a complementary userstyle for "black youtube" with my personal preferences.
link: https://userstyles.org/styles/62289/black-youtube-by-panos
additional_info:
Still under construction. I want it on other computers, so i'll put it here for now.

the style mostly hide stuff that i never use.
the main focus is that youtube is oversaturated by information. if you feel like information may affect your experience on the site, either consciously or subconsciously,  this might be your preference too. ^^

*will be adding colours to it someday, maybe even break it out entirely from black youtube, once i get more time to work on it.

Update 1.1

*due to bugs, i've decided to wait with the colourswitch. however, the colors are still in the code if you want to mess around / fix it.

Update 1.2

this style is not being developed anymore.
